Services

Home Remodeling

Wellspring specializes in a variety of home remodeling services, from small alterations -- like changing out your windows -- to whole-house remodeling projects, basement finishes, and kitchen remodels. Starting from the design to the final inspection, we can help transform your space with quality workmanship and a transparent construction process.

Small-Scale Projects

  • Window & door replacements
  • Trim installation
  • Backplash installation
  • Bathroom & kitchen tile installation
  • Countertop replacements
  • Cabinet installation
  • Custom carpentry
  • Cosmetic updates

Large-Scale Projects

  • Bathroom remodels
  • Kitchen remodels
  • Basement finishes
  • Whole-house remodels
  • Additions & garages
  • Shed and carport builds

Interior & Exterior Painting

A home remodel is not complete without a fresh coat of paint. We can take care of any exterior or interior repairs and window replacements that might be needed before painting as well.

Interior Painting

  • Trim & cabinets
  • Wood & butcher block staining
  • Walls, ceilings, stairways

Exterior Painting

  • Exterior trim & siding
  • Deck & fence painting and staining
  • Door painting and staining
  • Shed & garage painting

Decks, Pergolas, & Fences

We offer a number of solutions for customers looking to restore an existing deck, patio, pergola, fence, or build a new one.

Decks, Pergolas, & Patios

  • Composite decking installation
  • Deck & pergola restoration
  • Deck & pergola new builds
  • Concrete patios
  • Railings
  • Stairs

Fences

  • Cedar fences
  • Fence restoration
  • Custom fences

Don't see the service you're looking for?

No problem! We are always open to trying something new. Give us a call today at (970) 344-9607 to talk through the details of your project.
